Applicant : Scott, Jessica
School (district) : Richfield Schools  (Richfield Schools (316) )
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : 4H 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would like to bring more agri-science education to my school. I work in rural Idaho, and we do not provide our students enough science/math learning opportunities that tie to their out of school lives. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:
